name: Couchsurfing Mail Gateway Fixer
short_description:
Update: A lot has happened since I created this tool. Couchsurfing went commercial and recent unprofessional development made it even more chaotic to navigate and use than it was before. Luckily, There is an alternative: http://www.bewelcome.org. 

The 'csmailfix' project thus is left abandoned. It still works (more or less) but I won't do anything about it any longer. 
----

Couchsurfing (www.couchsurfing.org, CS) used to be great way to meet people, invite them at home and find a couch when travelling. This script modifies the messages you receive from CS by mail so that it they are properly displayed in your email client.
